title: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gift of children’s clothes: The vision indicates that someone gives the dreamer children’s clothes in a dream in a halal job through which he earns a lot of money. The vision heralds the arrival of a great source of livelihood or a new job. It also indicates the abundance of sustenance from trade. Since the vision symbolizes hearing good news Which the dreamer was waiting for. Download A child’s clothes that someone tore in a dream indicates obstacles and problems. It also indicates a financial crisis as well as sadness and anguish. Interpretation of seeing used clothes Seeing old clothes in a dream indicates obstacles that the dreamer is going through and may face problems at home. The vision symbolizes To the dreamer's fear of taking responsibility, in addition to his insecurity. Wearing clothes. Used and old things in a dream indicate that the dreamer lacks confidence in himself. Seeing himself wearing inappropriate clothes in a dream indicates the dreamer's feeling of disappointment, in addition to feeling lonely. Indicates The previous vision indicates that the dreamer will make a great effort to open a new door to survival after losing many opportunities. The married woman who sees this vision is a sign of the problems she will face with her marriage and she must think carefully and solve these problems. The vision warns of suffering as well as losing money or losing a job. Interpretation Seeing a gift of clothes for a married woman I got Married / Married Cleaning clothes in a dream indicates that she feels happy, regardless of the stability of her life with her husband. The vision predicts that the woman will get a lot of money in addition to many good things that she will receive. The vision symbolizes the goodness of her children’s circumstances and ease Their affairs in life are thanks to God. Wearing dirty clothes in a dream indicates the difficulties she faces. It also symbolizes some disagreements with her husband. Tight clothes in a dream indicate debts and financial crises that the dreamer faces. A husband giving clothes to his wife in a dream is a sign of her future pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing someone wearing clothes. Seeing someone wearing fortune teller clothes or dolls indicates participating in a project. As the vision shows, making a lot of profits. Seeing someone wearing the same racing clothes in a dream is a sign of happy events that bring them together. Stealing the dreamer’s clothes and then wearing them indicates Until this will be the reason for losing your money. The vision foretells marriage, and whoever stole the dress will be the cause of this marriage. Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes for a pregnant woman: If she sees clean children’s clothes in her dream, this means that her pregnancy period will pass safely and without fatigue. The vision also portends facilitating childbirth and the safety and well-being of the fetus. And his health. Someone giving a baby’s clothes to a pregnant woman indicates the person’s love for the woman and always wishes her all the happiness, goodness and success. Interpretation of seeing someone giving me clothes for single people. If she got unrelated clothes and the clothes were new in the dream, it indicates the happiness that she will see in her life. It also indicates connection Close or marriage. Giving someone dirty or torn clothes in a dream means a problem that you will face. It also indicates the presence of

title: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The truth is that it is not strange to find that most of the interpretations of this vision indicate goodness, because the girl is naturally a source of happiness and affection in the place where she is with her family and friends, and below you will learn about the different interpretations of this vision through the Shamloul website. There are different interpretations of this dream for the goodness it brings. Or evil for its owner, but as we mentioned previously, it is a vision that indicates goodness and living. The dream, depending on whether the fortuneteller is pregnant, married, single, or divorced, or whether the fortuneteller is male. Ibn Sirin saw more than one interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream, and here are the most important ones: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a girl in a dream is a sign of kindness And sustenance and blessing. He also believes that if the mermaid is a beautiful and good-looking girl, then this indicates the goodness and money that awaits him. Ibn Sirin believes that children in a dream in general mean happiness, livelihood, fertility, and good offspring. If one sees an ugly, ugly girl, wearing unclean clothes, then this A sign of problems and troubles that cause unhappiness. Ibn Sirin says that if one sees a child crying in a dream, this is a sign of the death of someone close and dear to him, and it may also be humiliation of accumulated debts and unpleasant news. Also do not miss:Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dreamInterpretation of seeing A girl for Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretations differed from Ibn Sirin, as he saw: Al-Nabulsi says that the interpretation of a girl: A little girl in a dream indicates happiness and pleasure in the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer sees a weak little girl in his dream, this means that the dreamer will be exposed to many pressures that will cause him depression. Al-Nabulsi believes that Seeing a little girl in a dream generally portends good skin for the coming of sustenance and many blessings for the pioneer. Seeing a little girl in a dream is a sign of abundant food, abundant money, and many good things. Seeing an ugly girl wearing dirty clothes in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and difficulties that the dreamer will suffer from, in addition It indicates that something bad will happen to him. Interpretation of a dream of a single girl Double Interpretations of seeing a girl in a dream for single people include: If an unmarried woman sees a girl in a dream, this indicates a close connection with her. In the event that an unmarried girl sees a beautiful young woman in a dream, and she is in reality If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a young girl with dirty clothes and an ugly appearance, this indicates that she will face difficulties and problems in the coming days. If an unmarried woman sees an ugly little girl in a dream, this indicates A constant feeling of despair and disappointment. If an unmarried girl sees a young girl in a dream, this is a sign of new changes in the coming days. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a young girl with torn clothes, this indicates feelings of despair and depression. If an unmarried girl sees a person She knows him and gave him a baby girl, so this is a vision that indicates that this person wants to marry her and it can also indicate that there is a benefit for her from this person. Interpretation of a dream about a girl in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking to clean the house

preview.html: This dream is considered one of the most common dreams for everyone and has many meanings, which we will explain to you through our website in the lines below. Follow us.Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking to clean the house in a dream for a single girl. If a female sees a dream in which she is cleaning the house. The interpretation of this dream is that she will soon be liberated from her worries and difficulties. Cleaning the house in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that she will enter into a successful and enjoyable romantic relationship. Regardless. Regarding academic success, her many interactions with people, friends, and family are also successful. If a female dreams that she is cleaning the house with soap and water, it removes dust and dirt and returns it to its clean state. The interpretation of this dream means that this girl will soon be freed from her troubles, problems, and sorrows, God willing. If An unmarried girl dreamed that she was cleaning her house with water, the interpretation of her dream is that she will be free from dangers, worries, sorrows and fears. They will be free from diseases and enjoy good health and prosperity. An unmarried girl cleaning the house with water in a dream represents the end of all her problems and the beginning of a new, stable and happy life with her husband. The future who offers her honesty, love, and affection. See also: Interpretation of the dead crying in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking to clean the house in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of cleaning her house has many signs and signs. Which indicates that she is happy and safe with her husband according to the interpretation. If you notice A married woman sees that her house is dirty and she cleaned it to make it look beautiful. This dream represents her marital bliss, the stability of her life, understanding, friendship and love between her and her husband. If a married woman dreams that she is cleaning, cleaning and beautifying her house. This dream may indicate that it is goodness and nourishment from God Almighty for her husband. As well as the high positions that await him soon and her joy as a result of this tremendous joy. If a married woman has a dream in which she cleans, then she is beautifying the house with a variety of equipment. The interpretation of this dream is that her financial conditions will improve, and she will get a lot of food, and God Almighty is for her. Interpretation of a vision A dead person asks to clean the house in a dream for a man and its meaning. If someone sees his father in a dream asking him to clean the house and his father died. This dream may indicate the father’s need for a lot of supplication and charity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a person who arranges, cleans, and cleans the residence of the deceased. This vision may be an indication On the deep need of the dreamer for the dead, and only God knows. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person looking at the living. The meaning of seeing a dead person asking for purification in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A dream in which a pregnant woman is cleaning her house of dust indicates that her circumstances will improve in her next life. Seeing her cleaning the house in The dream is also a pleasant vision for a woman, because it represents the accumulation of kindness and a lot of food. If a married woman dreams that she is cleaning the house, this means that her husband will get a promotion or a new job. Finding a piece of gold promises

preview.html: Regarding the definition of the science of visions and dreams and what are the characteristics that a dream interpreter should have, we will learn through our website gptafser.com/ in detail in the following lines, so stay tuned. What is the interpretation of dreams in Islam? Visions from the point of view of religion are a certain truth that is not subject to debate. Almighty God has given his servants from the prophets, believers and righteous people true visions. To understand their meaning and decode them. The evidence of the truth of the vision is what is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in verses about real events that occurred in the lives of the prophets. Such as our master Joseph, our prophet Muhammad and our master Abraham, peace be upon him. Examples of this include verse 102 of Surat Al-Saffat, which explains that God Almighty. It was revealed to our master Abraham to slaughter his son Ismail before redeeming him with a great ram. There is also verse 27 of Surat Al-Fath, which refers to the vision of the Noble Messenger Muhammad. When he dreamed that he was entering the Holy House with his friends, he was safe and comfortable. See also: Dreams that indicate magic How do I interpret my dreams? Before we go into the details of this matter, we must first know whether the interpretation of dreams Is it a talent that God has given to some worshipers. Or is it a knowledge acquired through reading, reading, and continuous practice of interpreting dreams? There is no doubt that visions are a gift from God that He bestows upon whomever He wishes of His servants, whether they are able to understand and interpret them or not. But the controversy here is whether a person can interpret his dreams without resorting to supplications and experts. The answer to this question was no, because there are symbols and signs that are difficult to understand and interpret. This is because some signs require the ability of God Almighty to understand and explain them. But this does not mean that the average person cannot interpret his dreams, but he can learn the principles through reading. And the foundations of dream interpretation, which are some clear symbols that appear to us all. These symbols are represented by animals, trees, the sun, and the moon, and there are also mountains, rain, sea, and sky. Not to mention food, clothes, people, things, birds, and many other symbols. The basic principles of dream interpretation There is a side of scholars who do not recognize the existence of origins and foundations for dream interpretation. This side believes that the interpreter of visions must have the talent or ability to express dreams, through which he can understand the divine signs. It confirms Others believe that there are principles and rules through which the interpreter can identify all the details of the dream. To interpret it correctly according to different factors that differ from one person to another. The principles and rules of interpreting visions came from the way in which the great interpreters of the past interpreted. They rely on the Holy Qur’an, the Noble Prophetic Hadith, the concepts of the Arabic language, and some symbols of ancient heritage. Read also: Can a bad dream come true? Interpretation of dreams from the Holy Qur’an The Holy Qur’an and its verses are among the most important and powerful sources of expressing visions. There are hundreds of examples that indicate that the interpretation of dreams is based on the verses of the Qur’an, and we mention among them the following: Imam Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing water in a dream that it indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing money and getting it back

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing money and getting it back. Interpretation of any dream carries within it either good or bad for the dreamer, and dream interpretations depend in their analysis on the social status of the viewer, whether he is married, single or pregnant, and one of the dreams. What some people can see is stealing money, so we will find out through a different website in the interpretation of a dream about stealing money and recovering it. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money and returning it to Imam Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer who steals his money in a dream indicates the financial loss that he will experience in real life. The thief entering the dreamer's house is evidence of the loss of a family member. If he sees his money stolen, this indicates the blessing of money, health and children. As for Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of stealing money and recovering it, it indicates a lot of goodness and tremendous comfort that the dreamer brings. Ibn Sirin also interpreted the dream as a sign of the return of the absent traveler to his country. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money and recovering it for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that her money has been stolen, this symbolizes that she is a girl who wastes the opportunities that come her way, whether it is marriage or job opportunities. Stealing money from an unmarried girl can be a sign of approaching marriage and engagement. If she dreams that he is stealing her money, she can get a job in a prestigious position. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money from someone else indicates that she will face many problems And the problems in her life Interpretation of a dream about stealing money and recovering it She says that her marriage is approaching What is the interpretation of recovering stolen money for a married woman? A married woman's dream indicates that she fulfills her duties towards her family to the fullest A married woman who dreams of stealing money is evidence of blessings at work and at home If she sees her close friend stealing from her in her dream, this means that she should be careful about her close friends in reality. The meaning of theft in a married woman's dream may be that she will separate from her husband due to the instability of their relationship. Seeing the impossibility of recovering stolen money for a married woman indicates the many problems in her home and the presence of envious people around her If a married woman sees the return of stolen money, it is one of the good visions that indicate the stability of her married life. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money and returning it to a pregnant woman: Theft in a pregnant woman's dream, especially theft at home, indicates the instability of her relationship with her husband If her money is stolen from her paper, this indicates the ease of her birth, God willing Theft in general in a pregnant woman's dream can indicate the problems that she will face in her life Seeing her husband's money stolen indicates her husband's great love for her From the interpretations of seeing A pregnant woman who is robbed needs to stay away from some wrong actions that she commits against herself or against her fetus. Some interpretations of stealing money and returning it in a dream: Stealing money from a bag indicates that there is a sick person in the family. Stealing money from the bank indicates that the dreamer loves to help others. As for stealing money from the house, it indicates the presence of

title: Interpretation of a dream about a queen according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the queen in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, Queen Rania or Elizabeth. Seeing the king’s wife. I dreamed that I became a queen in Ibn Shirin and Imam Sadiq, and more. Seeing the queen in a dream is one of the beautiful interpretations that many people around the world search for in order to know the meaning of dream interpretation, as Seeing the queen in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that causes a state of great happiness for the dreamer. In our time, queens have become relatively few in the past, and they only appear on official occasions of the country in which the queens are present. Among the most famous queens in the world are Queen Elizabeth and the Queen of England. Rania, King of Jordan. Interpretation of the Queen in a dream: If you dream of a queen, this portends success in your undertakings. If the queen in the dream is old or emaciated, this portends that sad things will happen at the level of social relationships. Seeing a real queen in a dream symbolizes intuition, personal growth, strength, and influence. If you see the queen smiling in a dream, this symbolizes a mother and you may need or miss your mother. Dreaming of a queen also symbolizes success in your future projects and success in marriage. If you see a dead queen in dreams, this means that you will have money, you will live happily with your family and your lost rights will be restored to you. Dreaming of a dead queen also indicates that you will witness the return of someone you missed. For a long time. – And if you see yourself sitting with the queen and eating with her, this indicates the arrival of new livelihoods and projects in your professional life. But if the queen is old or ugly in the dream, this may indicate the emergence of sad things and situations in your social life. We will explain to you below. title: Interpretation of a dream about granting a husband a certificate in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband giving testimony in a dream. The site does not provide interpretations, but it is from the heart. Interpretations by some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about giving your husband a certificate in a dream. If a woman sees that she is teaching her husband the certificate in a dream, this may indicate the end of the serious problems and crises that they have suffered from, thanks to God. Dreaming of giving your husband a certificate in a dream may indicate That you support him and support him in all the decisions he makes. If a woman sees herself teaching her husband the Shahada in a dream, this may indicate the approach of an important event that will happen to him during this time, and God knows best. It is possible to see the husband kissing the Shahada in a dream, this means that joys and happiness You will come to them during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an angry husband in a dream: A dream about a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate the intense love that exists between them at that moment. If the husband is angry with his wife in a dream, this may indicate mutual trust between the spouses during These days. A dream about a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate the psychological build-up and tensions that occur between them and they need to seek help from God. Whoever saw in her dream that her husband was angry with her, it could indicate his great trust in her at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming about the wedding of my friend who is flirting with me in a dream. If I see my friend’s husband flirting with me in a dream, this may indicate that this is stored in a false mind and that she must repent to God Almighty. Seeing a friend’s husband flirting with a woman in a dream may indicate goodness that will come. On her way during that period. It is possible that seeing a friend’s husband flirting with a woman in a dream indicates that the woman is very close to her friend during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream: My husband divorced me three times in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband has divorced her three times in a dream, she may This indicates a trip that the husband may suddenly take in those days, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing his wife divorced three times in a dream indicates some changes occurring between them, and this is an instinct, and God knows best. In the case of a dream about marriage, a woman being divorced three times in a dream, it could be It indicates the changes that occur in her life in those days, and God knows best. It is possible to see a husband divorcing his wife three times in a dream, as this may indicate a financial crisis that they are suffering from and that they will be freed from it in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a husband and not crying over him In a dream: In the event that a person sees the death of his husband and does not cry for him in the dream, this may indicate that the husband neglected his wife a lot during that period, and God knows best. In the event that a woman sees that her husband is dying and she does not cry for him in the dream, this could be a warning sign that she On the wrong road and that she had to be very careful around the house at that time. If one sees the death of one’s husband and does not cry for him in a dream, this may mean that the husband is traveling far and away from his family for a long time. Seeing the death of one’s husband and not crying for him in a dream may indicate

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a child for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about childhood for a single woman Seeing a child in a dream is one of the favorite things, but people differ in its interpretation. Some of them see the child as a good vision and an expression of livelihood, and some of them associate seeing a child with sadness and distress, so what do specialized translators think about this? We will discuss this in detail in the article. Interpretation of a dream about childhood for a single woman by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about childhood for a single woman? A child in a dream with an unmarried woman heralds happy news that the girl will receive on a practical or emotional level. If she is a student, it will be happy news of success. If he dreams of marriage, this is a sign that marriage is coming, and if he is looking for a job, he will find the job he wants. Seeing a child in a woman's dream can also be an unfavorable vision, as it can indicate the girl's fears and responsibilities and she must deal with them, especially if the child is crying or in poor condition or not well-prepared. If a girl sees a child in her dream without remembering his appearance or specifying his gender, whether male or female, this means that there are obstacles in her life that prevent her from achieving her dreams, which makes her feel them. Frustrated, so she must show strong determination to overcome obstacles and achieve her goals. If the child in the dream of an unmarried woman is hungry, this is evidence that she is characterized by laziness and negligence, which makes her not fully perform her duties, and she must change her behavior and bear her responsibilities. To succeed in her real life. Interpretation of a dream about childhood for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of a child for an unmarried woman according to the condition in which the child appears in the dream, at the end of worries and revolutionary anxiety. However, if the child is not beautiful or dirty or crying intensely, this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the difficulties and problems that the girl will face in her life in the coming period. If the girl sees a handsome child crawling and trying to reach her, then the child here symbolizes a young man with good morals and good morals who seeks to propose to her in reality. Important interpretations of childhood dreams for a single woman Interpretation of a dream of being single and having a child Seeing a male child in an unmarried woman's dream means that she will soon marry in real life and that she will start a new page in her life with a man who loves her and makes her happy. Some scholars have interpreted the little boy in an unmarried woman's dream as symbolizing her getting rid of a sin she committed, returning to the straight path and repenting, and sincere repentance. If a girl sees in her dream a male child crying intensely and cannot stop crying, this is an undesirable vision that indicates the problems that the dreamer will face in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman who has a baby girl Seeing a baby girl in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the happy visions that herald the girl's imminent marriage. Happy like a child in a girl's dream indicates gains in life, whether material gains or a lot of money that she will get in the future, closeness or success in her life in general.

Happy like a child in a girl’s dream indicates gains in life, whether material gains or a lot of money she will get in the future, closeness or success in her life in general. A

title: Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house: Snakes or snakes are cold-blooded reptiles and can walk on their bellies very quickly, and seeing them is actually one of the scary things that many people fear. The article discusses together the most important things that were said about this vision. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house. There are many rumors related to the interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house, and the dreamer is not afraid that he will have enemies in his life, but he is not afraid of them and can confront them. In the event that the dreamer sees that there are snakes in In her house, this indicates the presence of stalkers who want to harm her, but they are unknown. But if the dreamer sees that snakes inhabit the house in a dream, this is a sign of the presence of jinn and he must always take into account the legal ruqyah. When the dreamer sees that a group of snakes inside his house are eating food, this means that he is not satisfied. About his life and despairing of God’s blessings. However, if the dreamer sees that snakes are present in the garden of the house in a dream, it foretells many good things and many benefits that he will receive soon. The dreamer, if in a dream he sees snakes roaming around him in his house, symbolizes Exposure to financial crises and various problems. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, believes that seeing snakes in the house without fear and escaping from them means that he is distinguished by courage, bravery, and the ability to face problems and difficulties. In the event that the dreamer sees a snake in his house and deals with it normally If the dreamer sees snakes in his house and feels excessive fear in the dream, this indicates that he is suffering from Stress and anxiety in his life. But if the dreamer sees snakes in her house and is able to kill them in a dream, this portends her victory over enemies, achieving many achievements, and reaching what she desires. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house for unmarried women. An unmarried girl who sees snakes inside her house means that she will suffer. Of the many problems that she will face in her life, but she will be able to get rid of them soon. And if the virtuous woman sees herself killing snakes inside her house, this is a sign of victory over her enemies and harming them. But when the dreamer sees that she is caring for snakes and taming them without fear, this means that she enjoys She has a good reputation among people and always takes advice from others. When a girl sees that snakes are in her house and they try to bite her in a dream, this means that there is someone who wants to get close to her and will try to harm her. A girl’s dream that there are green and yellow snakes in her house is a warning message that she will be very tired. She must be careful. Seeing white snakes in a dream at home means that she will soon marry a good young man. If the dreamer sees snakes in her house and tries to approach them, this indicates the presence of a bad friend in her life and she must take caution.

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing a hunter in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a fisherman by Ibn Sirin? It indicates the pursuit of some things that the dreamer wants. The interpretation of seeing a human fisherman in a dream? It states injustice and arbitrariness. What is the interpretation of a man who sees that he is catching raw fish? Evidence that he is a raging man. What does it mean to see a fisherman fishing? In clear water? Evidence of happy and good events coming to him in his life. What is the interpretation of seeing a single hunter hunting rabbits and deer? Proof of marriage to a female relative. Interpretation of seeing a hunter in a dream. Seeing a hunter in a dream indicates the pursuit of some things that the dreamer wants. Then seeing a hunter in a dream indicates A lot of nutrition. Then, seeing a fisherman in a dream holding a fishing net is evidence of the twisted paths that the dreamer takes in order to achieve goals. Then, seeing a fisherman in a dream while catching a large fish with a hook, this is a sign of nutrition and halal benefits. The fisherman in a dream It indicates a man who is inclined towards women. A hunter who chases monsters and predatory animals in a dream is a sign of injustice and oppression. Interpretation of a lion hunter in a dream. Seeing a lion hunter in a dream is evidence of the nudity of a strong man. Seeing a monster hunter in a dream is evidence of injustice and oppression. A hunter in a dream It indicates a person who obtains money through deception and cunning. Then for a person to see in a dream a fisherman fishing in clear water is evidence of happy and good events coming to him in his life. Seeing a fisherman in a dream that he is fishing from a well indicates a bad situation. Then he sees a fisherman fishing for fish. It indicates the marriage of an unmarried person. Seeing a hunting dog in a dream for a man. Seeing a man in a dream who is a lion hunter is evidence of the presence of deceivers in his life. Then seeing a man hunting dogs in a dream bodes well. Seeing a hunter hunting from the sea is evidence of a lawful life. So, Seeing a fisherman in a single person’s dream is evidence of marriage in the near future and the birth of males. Seeing a man fishing is an unpleasant vision because it indicates injustice and money. Then, when a fisherman sees a man in a dream, catching fish with diamonds and jewelry inside, this indicates a fair wife. If you see a man catching raw fish in a dream, this means that he is lustful. Interpretation of a fisherman’s dream for a single woman. Seeing a fisherman in a dream while fishing during the holy months is repulsive in a girl’s dream. Then seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, who is the fisherman who catches rabbits and deer, is evidence To get married in the near future. Hence, seeing an unmarried woman eating fish caught by a fisherman is evidence of earning a halal livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about a fisherman for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is taking fish from a fisherman, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman takes A small fish from a fisherman, this indicates unpleasant things that will happen to it.
